name: Friday Night Funkin Character Test Playground Remake 2
name_original: Friday Night Funkin Character Test Playground Remake 2
description:
Thanks to a discord user with the name "Your best friend Static"

Remake 2 was made because itch.io only allowed 1000 files max and i have reached that limit, so i made this game with completely new characters.

If sprites don't load correctly, restart the game.

Original Game: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Mods used in the game:

Tricky phase 1, 3, 4: https://gamebanana.com/mods/44334

Discord: https://discord.com/brand-new
